allOf.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

allOf.title: Resource

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager proxy resource. It will not have tags and a location
allOf.title: Proxy Resource

oldValue.description: An Application Insights component linked storage accounts

properties.description: An Application Insights component linked storage account

oldValue.description: An Application Insights component linked storage accounts patch

properties.description: An Application Insights component linked storage account

error.description: Error response indicates Insights service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

oldValue.description: An Application Insights component linked storage account

value.description: The response to a live token query.

liveToken.description: JWT token for accessing live metrics stream data.

value.description: Represents an operation returned by the GetOperations request
Result of the List Operations operation

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

items.description: Represents an operation returned by the GetOperations request

oldValue.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
oldValue.name: resourceName

oldValue.description: The type of the Application Insights component data source for the linked storage account.
oldValue.name: storageType

description.from: Azure Application Insights client for setting linked storage account.
